pageContext.claim: “Comey has proven to be a liar and a leaker. Proven. He tries to act like a choir boy.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump disputes Comey's version of events, especially that the president pressed the former FBI director on a pledge of loyalty, but there is no evidence Comey lied about that incident. Comey kept detailed notes and told others about the conversation. The document that Comey "leaked" was his memo on the conversation, and he released it to the press after he was fired.
